title: 2027 Pro Football Hall of Fame class: Rob Gronkowski, Adrian Peterson, Ben Roethlisberger lead stacked group of first-time candidates

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: 2027 Pro Football Hall of Fame class: Rob Gronkowski, Adrian Peterson, Ben Roethlisberger lead stacked group of first-time candidates
sources.description: There are going to be some big names up for Hall of Fame consideration next year.
